ygData.subject: Re: Necro Spells..?
ygData.msgSnippet: The letter is great.  Who has actual experience with that dumb Vambire Embrace spell? Being just L8, I cannot get it to do anything but suck up a lot of mana,.
ygData.messageBody:
The letter is great. Who has actual experience with that dumb Vambire Embrace spell?
Being just L8, I cannot get it to do anything but suck up a lot of mana,. I tried with
no weapon, target a simple spider, and cast it,. I then engage in melee with no weapons
and spell does no damage at all. If someone makes it work I need a detailed account
else I have no offensive spell for non-undead targets.
